Translation.name: Otgonbaatar Amarbold
Translation.title: Front-end Developer / Electronic engineer
Translation.personalSentence: I am a recent graduate with a Bachelor of Science in Electrical and Electronic Engineering from Gunma University, Japan. My academic journey has fueled my passion for coding and problem-solving. I thrive on logical thinking, embrace new challenges with enthusiasm, and possess an unwavering determination to achieve my goals. My journey into the IT industry is driven by a desire to apply my skills and contribute to innovative solutions. I believe that every coding challenge is an opportunity for growth and a step towards becoming an IT professional. I am eager to bring my skills and mindset to a dynamic team and make a meaningful impact in the world of technology.
Translation.gundaiGakka: The Department of Electronic and Electrical Engineering
Translation.kosen: National Institute of Technology Tokyo College
Translation.addressInfo: Mongolia, Ulaanbaatar, Sukhbaatar District 1st khoroo, Monhouse 40-63
